alert.note: Alert for Hamilton; Merrick; Polk; York (Nebraska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Hastings (North Central Kansas and South Central Nebraska)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 25 at 1:31AM CDT by NWS Hastings
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of York, Hamilton, central Merrick and southwestern Polk Counties through 200 AM CDT... At 130 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Chapman to near Hampton to near Lushton. Movement was northeast at 35 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Strong thunderstorms will be near... Bradshaw around 135 AM CDT. York around 145 AM CDT. Central City, Polk and Hordville around 150 AM CDT. Waco and Benedict around 155 AM CDT. Stromsburg and Clarks around 200 AM CDT. Other locations impacted by these storms include Thayer. This includes Interstate 80 between mile markers 325 and 358. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
